upravniOdbor.subtitle: President
upravniOdbor.textperson: Vlaho Hrdalo is a lawyer who focuses on fintech, blockchain, and cryptocurrencies in his professional and scientific work.
Nikola Škorić is the founder and CEO of Electrocoin Ltd., which operates the leading Croatian cryptocurrency exchange and payment system Paycek.
Entrepreneur who loves new and unexplored things. Actively working on product and ecosystem development and as a partner in the MCC blockchain startup fund.

Bruno Škvorc is the founder of RMRK, an NFT protocol on the Kusama blockchain network.
Coder, Data Scientist, AI enthusiast, Blockchainer, UX designer
Belma Gutlić is the co-founder of the acquired company NodeFactory and head of the Solutions department at ChainSafe.
